overview:
Kevin Leversee is a passionate entrepreneur, lifelong student and Cluetrain Evangelist.

From a telecommunication root in the United States Army Signal Corp, to a career focusing on sales and marketing Kevin has always sought to understand communication flow. Prior to ManageSocial he founded: DesireMesh (Manila/San Francisco) also PandoraSquared (Sydney, Australia). PandoraSquared was voted No. 39 out of Australiaâ€™s Top Web 2.0 companies. He has worked as an Interactive Consultant for; TMP Worldwide in San Francisco, where he was in an informercial for Monster.com. Kevin enjoys speaking (Semcon, Hill and Knowlton Breakfast Bytes, National Defense College Web 2.0 Summit, Blogtalk Downunder) and has been interviewed and quoted (Australian Financial Review, ABC ONLINE, Ike Serenes) has a son Parker, Kevin resides in Manila Philippines, cooks Mexican Food, struggles with Spanish, Tagalog and of course as a geek he reads avidly.
